Blog.post: humm...i know i know another intrey already it hasnt even been 5 mins...yes it has but still.....i ws jus thinkin about how much i hate guys and how much a wastof time they are....but not all us are a wast of time...u can find ur occasinal..."Gentle men" and if lucky a guy who isnt a dick head and dont lie and fuck you over.....i guess i am jut talking out of spite or a recent relationship....idk probably both. but it dosnt matter...no one understands it...and i wish some one did. it really sucks espically when u for get about them for like a whole 3 weeks and then they just enter your mind again..... Hummmmmmm...i wonder if any body auctally reads this boaring shit i write.....o well it dont matter because it all sucks and i am a shitty writer.

well.....4:00 till now i was working.....what a long and boaing day...but over all a good one. i just dont wanna go to work tomorrow (well today.) not because it sucks....but because i am going to come home soaked tomorrow night.....:( and ways if i do so are they..thats all i gotta say...school starts monday i am so excited i am a sophmore and i missed rotc alot...we have so much fun in it. and we get to tourcher the freshmen....and scare them like we got scared last year..but anyways...i am gettin off here and goin to sleep....

well hi peoples i am brittany i am 16 and i live in navarre florida...im not really sure what to write i've never done one of these before and i have major writers block...... i saw my friends and her moms page soi decide to make one myself....they looked intresting...well i have a crappy job at kfc...i am in njrotc at school...i pretty much live for it...im going into the navy to be in the Top Gun... my call sign is "charlie"... im not to sure what eles to write...as i said im not very intresting and i suck at writeing espically about myself.....i am a pretty nice person i am told i can be a bitch but hell everyone can be......i mean what woman isnt a bitch... i havnt really had much luck in the guy department an i pretty much gave up i am sick of being hurt or hurting them either way it sucks and im threw with it all....and if there is any man out there thats not an asshole and knows how to treat a girl and not fuck them over and lie to them.....well im here... well since i have pretty much boared you people i am gonna stop writing....

well today over all was good...rotc is kickin my ass....it is so fun though,and the NS 1s are great they dont know shit so i feel better because i was like that last year. anyways....well i know in my recent entery i said i quit my shitty job..well i didnt im still working there and its ok because they hired a new buffe bitch not very nice but some one eles can put up with marlyns shit for a change! i found out she is such a perfectionish but she has never once closed buffe...its bullshit! yeah but anyways i dont wanna talk about that! i talked to my exboyfriend today he really made me feel like a complet ass....i fucked up everything with him i had good in my life....but i would like to think i have moved on with my life, and got it in petty good order i got a fairly decent job that pays pretty good i am happy in NJROTC like all my classes in school i am happier. but the most important thing is that i am concitrated in my futur...i am leaving it at that becasue this is way to long....

well tonight i qut my shitty job at kfc because because the buffe manager is a bitch and she can kiss my ass i am sick of her shit and she can shove that buffe up herass (that would hurt)....... ever since the first day i have been working there she has done nothing but give me shit ad im not gonna take it anymore and i need to focous on my school work and rotc.....thats whats important to me right now...not a fucking shitty ass fast ood job....well im out
